name: Penasulia
startIntroPart1: Pardon me for poor choice of words.
startIntroPart2: I am Naomi the Pious, princess of Gamou house, very pleased to collaborate with thou!
declaringWar: We come to civilize you, please do not resist!
attacked: There is no surprise, this day would have came earlier.
defeated: Nobody is innocent, this is fair to us, GG.
introduction: Halia to casamita, I am Naomi the Pious, princess of Gamou house, very pleased to collaborate with you!.
neutralLetsHearIt: Wanna cup o tea mr ambassador?
afterPeace: Bon voyage me old cream cracker!

name: Chizchia
startIntroPart1: Please rule your people of Chizchia nicely.
startIntroPart2: Let's ride the great wave, hang out around the deepest reef!
declaringWar: You are the barrier of the mankind progression!
attacked: War is loss of many people's youth and nature itself.
defeated: As long as the Chizchia stands, liberalism shall stand...
introduction: Let's be friend, just friend. Let's ride the great wave, hang out around the deepest reef!
neutralNo: This is harmful for the enviroment.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: This apology cannot pay for the millions of lives.
tradeRequest: This is verified by WFTO, fair trade for workers!

name: Boreaul
attacked: Great! I will cut off your import, laugh in mercantilism.
defeated: I've chased the meaningless of money.
introduction: This is Ancap city, we have no rule, let's trade
neutralNo: That would not benefit our business.
hateLetsHearIt: Ah I am not listening, I am busy with my billards...
hateNo: I dont listen to poor people
afterPeace: That is enough damage for my business.

name: Dlotho South Pole
startIntroPart2: Who are we? We dont remember, everything we know is wrath. Reclaim our honor!
defeated: We were just misunderstood and stuck in forever wrath, we will rise again from the ashes, you owe us your head!
introduction: The First Generation of Old World hyper power has been risen from the ashes, prepare to dead!
tradeRequest: At least we dont want your blood this time.
